title: Authentication - Successful sign-up as Artist
description: Verify that a new user can successfully sign up, select the Artist role during onboarding, and access the Artist dashboard with appropriate route access.

steps.description: Navigate to the sign-up page.
Provide valid email and password and submit the sign-up form.
On onboarding page, select 'Artist' role and complete onboarding.
User is redirected to the Artist dashboard.
Verify sidebar navigation and all Artist management pages are accessible.

title: Authentication - Successful sign-up as Fan
description: Verify that a new user can successfully sign up, select the Fan role during onboarding, and access the Fan dashboard with appropriate route access.

steps.description: Navigate to the sign-up page.
Provide valid email and password and submit the sign-up form.
On onboarding page, select 'Fan' role and complete onboarding.
User is redirected to the Fan dashboard.
Verify personalized feed, purchase history, and billing tabs are accessible.

title: Authentication - Sign-in with valid credentials
description: Verify that existing users can sign in with valid credentials and are redirected based on their role to correct dashboards.

steps.description: Navigate to the sign-in page.
Input existing valid email and password.
Submit the sign-in form.
User is redirected to the appropriate dashboard based on role.

title: Authentication - Sign-in with invalid credentials
description: Verify that users attempting to sign in with invalid credentials receive appropriate error messages and are not authenticated.

steps.description: Navigate to the sign-in page.
Input invalid or non-existent email and/or password.
Submit the sign-in form.
Verify error message is shown indicating invalid credentials.
User remains on sign-in page without access.

title: Role-Based Middleware - Block access without authentication
description: Verify that unauthenticated users attempting to access protected Artist or Fan areas are redirected to the sign-in page.

steps.description: Try to navigate directly to an Artist dashboard route while not authenticated.
User is redirected to sign-in page.
Try to navigate directly to a Fan dashboard route while not authenticated.
User is redirected to sign-in page.

title: Role-Based Middleware - Prevent cross-role access
description: Verify that users cannot access the dashboards or routes of the opposite role (Artist cannot access Fan dashboard; Fan cannot access Artist dashboard).

steps.description: Sign in as Artist user.
Attempt to navigate to Fan dashboard route.
Access is denied or redirected away from Fan dashboard.
Sign in as Fan user.
Attempt to navigate to Artist dashboard route.
Access is denied or redirected away from Artist dashboard.

title: Role-Based Middleware - Redirect users without role to onboarding
description: Verify that users who have authenticated but have not selected a role are redirected to the onboarding page.

steps.description: Sign in as user without assigned role.
Attempt to access any protected route.
User is redirected to onboarding page to select role.

title: Landing Page - Email waitlist form validation success
description: Verify that the landing page email waitlist form validates input and shows a success toast upon valid submission.

steps.description: Navigate to the landing page.
Input a valid email into the waitlist signup form.
Submit the form.
Form submits successfully and a toast notification confirms submission.

title: Landing Page - Email waitlist form validation error
description: Verify that invalid emails in waitlist signup show inline validation errors and prevent submission.

steps.description: Navigate to the landing page.
Input an invalid email format into the waitlist signup form.
Attempt to submit the form.
Inline validation error message is displayed next to the email field.
Form is not submitted.

title: Artist Dashboard - Profile management
description: Verify that artist can update their profile information with form validation, displaying inline errors and success notifications.

steps.description: Sign in as Artist user and navigate to the profile management page.
Input valid updates to profile fields and submit.
Updates are saved successfully and a success toast is shown.
Input invalid/missing mandatory fields and attempt to submit.
Inline validation errors appear and submission is blocked.

title: Artist Dashboard - Digital product upload with validation
description: Verify that digital product uploads enforce file size and format restrictions with proper validation and error feedback.

steps.description: Sign in as Artist and navigate to product upload page.
Upload file within allowed size and MIME types.
Upload is accepted and product can be saved.
Attempt to upload file exceeding size limit.
Inline error indicates file size limit exceeded and upload is rejected.
Attempt to upload file of disallowed MIME type.
Inline error indicates invalid file type and upload is rejected.

title: Fan Dashboard - Purchase history display
description: Verify that fan users can view their correct purchase history with accurate details and filtering options.

steps.description: Sign in as Fan user and navigate to purchase history page.
Purchase history is displayed with all relevant details including date, amount, and items.
Use filtering options to filter purchase history.
Filtering updates purchase list accordingly.

title: Public Artist Hub - Access by valid artist slug
description: Verify that public artist hubs are accessible via valid artist slugs without authentication and display correct artist profile, latest drops, and tour dates.

steps.description: Navigate to a valid artistâ€™s public hub URL.
Artist profile information and content load properly.
Latest drops and tour dates are displayed.

title: Public Artist Hub - Access by reserved or invalid slug
description: Verify that reserved or unregistered artist slugs are not accessible and show appropriate error or redirect.

steps.description: Navigate to a reserved slug or invalid artist slug URL.
User is shown an error message or redirected to landing page.

title: Theme Toggle - Switch between light and dark mode
description: Verify that the theme toggle correctly changes the UI between light and dark themes and persists user preference across sessions.

steps.description: Sign in and navigate to any page with theme toggle.
Toggle theme from light to dark.
UI updates theme accordingly.
Logout and sign back in.
Previously selected theme preference is applied.

title: Forms - Inline validation using Zod schemas
description: Verify that all forms in onboarding, profile, products, and billing show client-side inline validation errors and success toasts on submission.

steps.description: Navigate to various forms (onboarding, profile, product creation).
Input invalid data and attempt to submit forms.
Inline validation errors display next to invalid fields.
Correct inputs with valid data and resubmit forms.
Forms submit successfully and success toast notifications appear.

title: Accessibility - Keyboard navigation and focus indicators
description: Verify that the application UI components comply with WCAG 2.1 AA standards including keyboard navigability and visible focus states.

steps.description: Use only keyboard to navigate through key pages: landing page, dashboards, forms.
Focus moves logically and all interactive elements show visible focus states.
No keyboard traps exist.

title: Accessibility - Screen reader support and contrast ratios
description: Verify that UI elements are accessible with screen readers and meet color contrast standards.

steps.description: Use a screen reader to navigate landing page and dashboards.
All UI elements have appropriate ARIA labels and semantic roles.
Verify color contrast ratios meet WCAG 2.1 AA standards for all text and UI elements in both light and dark themes.

title: Performance - Verify page load and interactivity metrics
description: Verify performance metrics meet targets: First Contentful Paint < 1.5s, Largest Contentful Paint < 2.5s, Cumulative Layout Shift < 0.1, Time to Interactive < 3s.

steps.description: Load landing page, artist dashboard, and fan dashboard on mobile and desktop devices.
Performance metrics recorded meet the defined performance criteria.

title: Authentication - Sign-in attempt for user without assigned role
description: Verify that users who sign in but have no assigned role are redirected to onboarding to select role.

steps.description: Sign up or create a user with no assigned role.
Sign in as this user.
User is redirected to onboarding page to select Artist or Fan role before accessing app.
